preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 24 g of aluminum and 3 g of boron. 
 2. Measure 9 g of nickel and 24 g of scandium. 
 3. Combine all measured materials in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 4. Use a mortar and pestle to thoroughly mix the powders until uniform.
